member.name: RENDEZVOUS_SESSION_FLAGS
member.summary: Provides the list of possible flags for the session invitation.

member.name: RENDEZVOUS_SESSION_FLAGS.RSF_INVITER
member.summary: The party that sets the session object is the inviter.

member.name: RENDEZVOUS_SESSION_FLAGS.RSF_INVITEE
member.summary: The party that sets the session object is the recipient.
